definitions.definition: A short microscopic hairlike organelle projecting from a eukaryotic cell (such as a unicellular organism or one cell of a multicelled organism) which serve either for propulsion by causing currents in the surrounding fluid or as sensors .
One of the fine hairs along an insect 's wing .
One of the hairs or similar protrusions along the margin of an organ .

main_definition: ( cytology ) A short microscopic hairlike organelle projecting from a eukaryotic cell (such as a unicellular organism or one cell of a multicelled organism) which serve either for propulsion by causing currents in the surrounding fluid or as sensors .
secondary_definitions: ( entomology ) One of the fine hairs along an insect 's wing .
( botany ) One of the hairs or similar protrusions along the margin of an organ .
